_text_: Log-into the SHARE Portal on the day of your state hearing (prior registration required for new users). A “Connect to this Hearing” button will be available on the scheduled appeal. Click the button to connect to the hearing via Microsoft Teams. Prior to the start of the hearing, you will be admitted to the hearing by the hearing officer or Agency representative. You can choose to participate on a camera or voice only. You can upload documents in the SHARE portal for the hearing officer to review related to your hearing. A note on downloading Teams: It is strongly recommended that virtual hearing participants download the free Microsoft Teams desktop application prior to connecting to the hearing.
